                              java.lang.String[] destinations,

        Parameters:

        input - the data to be written to the file
        Returns:
        0 if successful, -1 if failed

      • getPlacesOrdered

        public static java.lang.String[][] getPlacesOrdered(java.lang.String baseAddress,
                                                    java.lang.String[] destinations)
        This method takes an address and some destinations and finds the travel time to those destinations Sorts them by travel time
        Parameters:
        baseAddress - the starting address for all travels
        destinations - the places which will be traveled to
        Returns:
        an ordered jagged array of destinations sorted by type and travel time

      • GetBestPlaces

        public static java.lang.String[] GetBestPlaces(java.lang.String[][] destinationsWithTravelTimesAppended)
        This is a user method. Asks user for a starting address and destinations Calls the getAddressMethod and Travel Times on each destination Finds the particular establishment of a type with the fastest travel time and adds that to a string array.
        Returns:
        results An array that holds an establishment of each type with the fastest travel time

        destinations - the places under examination
